Sandstorm transforms to a robot. Both of Sandstorm's claws, now his hands s=
nap open. In the left, a pair of missiles are docked. In the right, a cyber=
-bee is docked. His tail, now mounted on his back, begins to glow as energy=
 is charged into it.

Sandstorm: That'll speak for itself.

Sandstorm's off=
icial stats:

Strength: 8.0
Intelligence: 9.0
Speed: 6.0
Endurance: 8.0
Ran=
k: 10.0
Courage: 9.0
Firepower: 7.0
Skill: 9.0

Sandstorm: I was a Maximal =
Commander on Cybertron, and was pretty respected. I hope I will please the =
Predacon cause as much as I pleased the Maximals.

His weapons disarm and h=
e bows.

Sandstorm: Master Hydras, I swear allegiance to the Predacon Army.=
..

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: airly2000 <airly2002@...=
>
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, February 26, 2003 12:02 A=
M
  Subject: Hydras/Sandstorm


  Hydras:

  "I'm Hydras... You leader. Now=
, Sandstorm, tell me your skills"


  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Holly=
wood Narrator" 
  <hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
  > OOC: If I make any m=
istakes in this post, I'm sorry, but I'm just 
  very confused right now an=
d think I missed a reply somewhere.
  > 
  > BIC:
  > 
  > The two pods cra=
cked open. The one that was brought back to the 
  Predacon base is focused=
 on. A set of legs came out of the side. 
  Arachnid legs. A set of arachni=
d legs then came out of the other 
  side. A long tail rose, and then two c=
laws emerged. The giant 
  scorpion pulled itself from the pod and stood on=
 the edges. It was 
  gray with orange claws.
  > 
  > Sandstorm: Greetings=
, my name is Sandstorm. Identify yourself...
